column4: Hi guys, question..Is there away to stop my end users from deleting their browser history in Ubuntu
no.. told you to check the manpage of chattr. there are system flags you can set on files to allow appending, but not delete

A file with the 'a' attribute set can only be open in append mode for writing.  Only the superuser or a process possessing blah blah blah blah'.  This solution is more elegant than other software because its system level. find the history file and lock it up.
